eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian.utils

Class PlateuStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian.utils.PlateuStructure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlateauLDA, PlateauLDAFlink, PlateuIIDReplication

    public abstract class PlateuStructure
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class defines a Plateu Structure.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setDAG

        public void setDAG(DAG dag)
        Sets the DAG of this PlateuStructure. By default, all parameter variables are set as non-replicated and all non-parameter variables are set as replicated.
        Parameters:
        dag - the DAG model to be set.
